cmd.help.title: My commands
cmd.bighelp.title: My commands
cmd.bighelp.commands.bighelp: Displays big detailed help. Avoid using this command in chat as it can be spammy!
cmd.bighelp.commands.exploits: Checks your server for bots with unpatched bugs, which can let people raid your server! For instance, sometimes such bugs can let raiders to ping a lot of people even if they are not allowed to do it!

cmd.help.description: For now my commands are (I'm quite cool btw):
cmd.whitelist.title: Whitelist
cmd.whitelist.description: Whitelists a member. The bot will just ignore them.
cmd.whitelist.bigDescription: Whitelists a member. The bot will just ignore them. Make sure to only whitelist members you trust! Don't whitelist bots which can be used to ban/kick/do other moderator actions. (actually you can whitelist any user lol)
